title: How can I close my GStocks PH account?
content:
#### ADVISORY:

Bank Transfer to Maya will be right back! Our partner is working to restore the service as soon as possible.

- [How can I update my account information in my GStocks PH account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31218818513305-How-can-I-update-my-account-information-in-my-GStocks-PH-account)

- [How can I close my GStocks PH account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31259171664537-How-can-I-close-my-GStocks-PH-account)

## Promoted articles

- [What are the steps to get a Fully Verified GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017722393-What-are-the-steps-to-get-a-Fully-Verified-GCash-account)
- [Accepted IDs for GCash Verification](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900000948786-Accepted-IDs-for-GCash-Verification)
- [How do I send money to another GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017566614-How-do-I-send-money-to-another-GCash-account)

Closing your GStocks PH account is permanent and **irreversible.** Once your account is closed, you will no longer have access to any associated data or funds.

### **How to close your GStocks PH account:**

1\. **Make sure your GStocks PH balance is zero**

Before deleting your account, ensure that you sell any remaining funds in your GStocks PH account. Don’t make any new transactions until you receive your funds in your GCash Wallet.

2\. **Check for Completed Transactions**

After the sell order processing days, open your GCash app and check the Inbox to confirm your transactions.

3\. **Request for Account Closure**

Once all sell order transactions are complete and your GStocks PH Wallet balance is zero, fill out the [Account Closure form,](https://help.gcash.com/hc/article_attachments/31259130138521) then [click here to file a request to close your account.](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ind=normal&tf_360023219534=gstocks_ph__i_want_to_delete_my_ph_gstocks_account&ticket_form_id=360000706713)

### **Need more Help?**

For other inquiries or concerns, check out the following articles:

- [Can I transfer stockholdings to another Philippine stock brokerage firm in GStocks PH?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31225286057369)
- [How can I update my account information in my GStocks PH account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31218818513305)
- [I can’t buy or sell in GStocks PH. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31223103981209-Unable-to-proceed-with-GStocks-PH-order)

- [AB Capital Account Closure Form.pdf](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/31259130138521)
